C:\\Tools\\ncllball.github.io\\css.css.text: These rules intentionally coexist with .program-card for an incremental migration.

C:\\Tools\\ncllball.github.io\\docs\\car.text: - Error modes: if the page hasn't been migrated, legacy `.program-card` styling will continue to apply as a fallback.
1. Audit pages using `.program-card` and note any modifiers like `division-card--overlay`.
1. Audit pages using `.program-card` and note any modifiers like `division-card--overlay`.
1. Audit pages using `.program-card` and note any modifiers like `division-card--overlay`.
2. Add namespaced classes to the HTML while keeping existing `.program-card` (e.g., `<article class="program-card ncll-card">`).
- Because migrations keep the original `.program-card` class in place, rollback is simple: remove `ncll-card` classes from the page or revert the commit.
- After migrating all pages, remove legacy `.program-card` global rules and keep the `ncll-card` system as the canonical pattern.

C:\\Tools\\ncllball.github.io\\Softball\.text: Note for coaches: If you need more detailed information than what's provided here — such as specific rules, draft procedures, or coaching resources — you're probably a coach! Head over to our Coaching section for comprehensive guides, training materials, and division-specific coaching information.
A Division introduces coach pitch with a softball, building fundamentals while keeping the game fun and accessible.
A Division introduces coach pitch with a softball, building fundamentals while keeping the game fun and accessible.
AA blends coach pitch and player pitch so kids can compete while still learning situations and confidence on the mound.
AA blends coach pitch and player pitch so kids can compete while still learning situations and confidence on the mound.
AAA is the launch point for full player pitch with assessments, parity drafts, and two games per week once the season begins.
AAA is the launch point for full player pitch with assessments, parity drafts, and two games per week once the season begins.
Majors is the capstone for 10-12s with full evaluations, parity drafts, and a three-game weekly cadence.
Majors is the capstone for 10-12s with full evaluations, parity drafts, and a three-game weekly cadence.
Junior softball moves to the full-sized diamond with interleague play across District 8.
Junior softball moves to the full-sized diamond with interleague play across District 8.
